feed.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap

entry.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap
entry.summary: In August 2015, Upal Chakraborty posted on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, proposing a solution to the maximum block size debate. He shared a link to his website where he explained his calculations based on the previous block size calculation. It is unclear from the post whether Upal's proposal gained any traction or had any impact on the ongoing debate at the time.
